welcome.title: Welcome to Food Fiesta
welcome.message: It’s a pleasure to meet you. We are excited that you’re here so let’s get started!

walkthrough.title: Walkthrough
walkthrough.firstMessage: Order from the best local restaurants with easy, on-demand delivery.
walkthrough.secondMessage: Free delivery for new customers via Apple Pay and others payment methods.
walkthrough.thirdMessage: Easily find your type of food craving and you’ll get delivery in wide range.

signIn.title: Sign In
signIn.description: Welcome to Food Fiesta Food Services
signIn.subDescription: Enter your Phone number or Email address for sign in. Enjoy your food :)
signIn.forgotDescription: Enter your email address and we will send you a reset instructions.
signIn.resetDescription: We have sent a instructions email to

createAccount.title: Create Account
createAccount.subTitle: Already have account?
createAccount.description: Enter your Name, Email and Password for sign up.
createAccount.subDescription: By Signing up you agree to our Terms Conditions & Privacy Policy.
createAccount.name: Full name

signIn.getStartedDescription: Enter your Phone number for sign in. Enjoy your food :)

error.password: Password must be at least 6 characters
error.name: Enter your full name
error.acceptTerms: You must accept the terms and conditions
